content: शिखंडकः [शिखंड इव-कन्] {@--1@} A lock of hair left on the crown of the head at tonsure. {@--2@} Locks or tufts of hair left on the sides of the head; (these are three or five in the case of the Kṣatriyas); कुवलयदलश्यामास्निग्धः शिखंडकमंडनः <ls>U. 4. 19.</ls> {@--3@} A crest, tuft. plume. {@--4@} A peacock's tail.
